RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH: Marcos Antonio Baccarin concluiu o doutorado em Ciкncias Agrбrias (Fisiologia Vegetal) pela Universidade Federal de Viзosa em 1995. Atualmente й Professor Titular da Universidade Federal de Pelotas, foi bolsista de produtividade em pesquisa do Conselho Nacional de Desenvolvimento Cientнfico e Tecnolуgico.Concluiu em fevereiro de 2017 Pуs-doutoramento na Universitа degli Studi di Verona. Foi Presidente da Sociedade Brasileira de Fisiologia Vegetal no perнodo de 2005-2007. Publicou vбrios artigos em periуdicos especializados e trabalhos em anais de eventos. Orienta estudantes de mestrado e doutorado, alйm de iniciaзгo cientнfica. Atua na бrea de Botвnica, com кnfase em Fisiologia Vegetal. Atuou como membro de avaliaзгo do Comitй de Ciкncias Agrarias da CAPES, para avaliaзгo dos Programa de Pуs Graduaзгo, e й avaliador dos curso de graduaзгo credenciado pelo INEP.

PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.NOME-DO-PROJETO: Caracteristicas fotossintйticas de plantas de arroz irrigado
PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.DESCRICAO-DO-PROJETO: O arroz й um dos principais cereais consumidos no mundo, representando, cerca de 30% da produзгo total de grгos. Considerando que atй o ano 2025 a populaзгo mundial aumente cerca de 1,5 vez o valor atual, o que representa um acrйscimo de 2% na populaзгo consumidora e um acrйscimo de 1,6% na demanda, й imprescindнvel a elevaзгo da produзгo de arroz dentro de um perнodo de tempo relativamente curto. O aumento na produзгo global de grгos tem se favorecido pela: expansгo das бreas de cultivo, modernizaзгo dos mйtodos de irrigaзгo, e melhoramento genйtico. Entre muitos fatores fisiolуgicos associados а produзгo, a fotossнntese й fundamentalmente importante e tem mostrado influencia significativa na produзгo de grгos. Este projeto de tem por objetivo avaliar a relaзгo entre a atividade fotossintйtica e a produзгo de grгos em arroz cultivado no RS. Para tanto, serгo desenvolvidos vбrios experimentos com objetivos especнficos: a) Avaliar as caracterнsticas fotossintйticas de duas cultivares de arroz com potencial de produзгo contrastante e relacionб-las aos diferentes estбdios de desenvolvimento das plantas; b) Analisar a capacidade fotossintйtica de vбrias cultivares de arroz, lanзadas em diferentes perнodos; c) Avaliar a capacidade fotossintйtica de cultivares de arroz de ciclos precoce, mйdio e tardio; d) Comparar caracterнsticas de crescimento e de partiзгo de assimilados entre diferentes cultivares de arroz.Avaliar caracteristicas fotossintйticas em plantas de arroz

PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.NOME-DO-PROJETO: O emprego de mutantes fotossintйticos de Arabidopsis thaliana para o estudo e compreensгo dos mecanismos de eficiкncia de conversгo da luz em energia quнmica
PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.DESCRICAO-DO-PROJETO: A fotossнntese aerуbica й o processo de conversгo de luz em energia em nossa biosfera, transforma a energia dos fуtons na energia de carboidratos. Na fotossнntese de organismos eucariуticos, reaзхes luz-dependentes sгo realizadas por dois complexos supramoleculares (fotossistemas), que catalisam a absorзгo da luz e transporte de elйtrons da бgua para o NADP+. Em ambientes naturais, as plantas sгo frequentemente expostas a flutuaзхes rбpidas na intensidade da luz, e quando o fornecimento de energia da luz estб em excesso, outras funзхes do sistema de absorзгo da luz e do transporte de elйtrons permitem a dissipaзгo do excesso de energia absorvida livre. A operaзгo integrada da fotossнntese, a dissipaзгo de energia, e o equilнbrio entre a sнntese de ATP e poder redutor estб no centro da regulaзгo fotossintйtica e suas respostas ao meio ambiente. Em alta luz, quando a quantidade de energia captada pelo LHC excede a capacidade de transporte de elйtrons, outros mecanismos de-excitaзгo tornam-se importantes. Este dano foto-oxidativo diminui a eficiкncia da fotossнntese, sendo denominado fotoinibiзгo, assim a compreensгo de detalhes moleculares de dissipaзгo tйrmica abre a possibilidade de manipular a eficiкncia na utilizaзгo da luz, a fim de aumentar a produtividade das culturas. As informaзхes de como as plantas respondem a luz alta e como elas desenvolvem mecanismos de regulaзгo nos ajuda a entender os limites da eficiкncia do uso da radiaзгo e sua tolerвncia ao ambiente estressante. O uso de mutantes como ferramentas experimentais na anбlise dos fenфmenos fotossintйticos й uma abordagem bem estabelecida, e grandes coleзхes de mutantes estгo disponнveis em espйcies em diversos organismos experimentais. A caracterizaзгo e uso de um grupo de mutantes de Arabidopsis thaliana contribui para o conhecimento e anбlise do processo fotossintйtico. Os mutantes com alteraзхes na fotossнntese tкm sido amplamente adotados como ferramentas experimentais e tкm sido muito ъteis em muitos aspectos de pesquisas. Respostas dos mutantes para alta irradiaзгo podem oferecer informaзхes importantes sobre os estudos das relaзхes funcionais dentro dos processos de fotossнntese e servem potencialmente para a construзгo de novos genуtipos com maior tolerвncia ao stress ambiental, e й possнvel identificar processos importantes envolvidos na fotoproteзгo ao estresse. Estudos futuros envolvido no controle da fotossнntese nos permitirб manipular a produtividade da planta e sua capacidade em crescer em diferentes ambientes, frequentemente adversos. Este projeto tem como objetivo analisar os mecanismos envolvidos no uso de energia luminosa e dissipaзгo tйrmica de energia absorvida em plantas superiores (A. thaliana) em condiзхes de estresses abiуticos, com кnfase em fotoproteзгo. O projeto serб o desenvolvimento com uso de mutantes de A. thaliana, fornecidos em cooperaзгo pelo Prof. Dr. Roberto Bassi responsбvel pelo Laboratorio di Fotosintesi, Departamento de Biotecnologia da Universitа degli Studi di Verona.

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS:
RESUMO
Muitas enzimas estгo envolvidas em reaзхes de defesa de plantas contra patуgenos. O objetivo deste trabalho foi verificar alteraзхes na atividade de algumas destas enzimas em plantas de feijгo originadas de sementes microbiolizadas com um isolado de Pseudomonas do grupo das fluorescentes (isolado DFs842). Sementes de feijгo cultivar BRS Valente foram imersas em suspensгo salina preparada a partir de crescimento bacteriano com 24 h do isolado de Pseudomonas (OD540=0,5) sabidamente biocontroladora de Xanthomonas axonopodis pv. phaseoli. Como testemunhas, as sementes foram imersas em soluзгo salina (NaCl 0,85%). Apуs a microbiolizaзгo por 5 h a 10єC, as sementes foram plantadas em vasos contendo uma mistura de solo nгo esterilizado, areia e esterco bovino (proporзгo 3:1:1), mantidos em casa de vegetaзгo. A inoculaзгo do patуgeno foi realizada na terceira folha verdadeira de todas as plantas, fazendo-se cortes com tesoura imersa em suspensгo salina do patуgeno (X. axonopodis pv. phaseoli) preparada a partir de crescimento de 24 h (OD540=0,4). Cвmaras ъmidas foram mantidas 24 h antes e apуs a inoculaзгo. Para o preparo do extrato protйico, as trкs primeiras folhas verdadeiras foram coletadas individualmente em 5 йpocas de coleta distintas: uma, momentos antes da inoculaзгo e as demais nos tempos seis, 24, 72 h e 15 dias apуs a inoculaзгo. Este extrato protйico serviu de fonte para as determinaзхes do teor de proteнnas solъveis totais (PST), atividade da polifenol oxidase (PPO) e da peroxidase (PO), as quais foram realizadas por leituras espectrofotomйtricas. Os resultados demonstraram aumento significativo no teor de PST e na atividade de PPO nas plantas submetidas ao tratamento com isolado DFs842, sendo que, o teor de PST foi o dobro, em relaзгo аs plantas nгo tratadas. Tambйm foi observado que, mesmo antes da inoculaзгo do patуgeno o teor de PST e a atividade de PPO nas plantas tratadas estavam bem maiores. Em relaзгo а atividade de PO houve reduзгo da mesma na
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES:
ABSTRACT
Many enzymes are involved in plant defense against pathogens. The purpose of this study was to verify alterations in activity of some enzymes in bean plants originated from microbiolization of seeds with a fluorescent isolate (DFs842) of Pseudomonas. Bean seeds (cv. "BRS Valente") were immersed in a bacterial suspension of a 24 hours old Pseudomonas culture (OD540=0,5) known as a Xanthomonas axonopodis pv. phaseoli biocontroler. Check treatment consisted of seeds immersed in a saline solution (NaCl 0,85%). After microbiolization for 5 hours at 10єC, seeds were sowed in a non sterilized substrate composed of soil, sand and bovine manure mixture (3:1:1 ratio) disposed in pots in a greenhouse. The pathogen was inoculated by cutting the third true leaves with scissors previously immersed in the bacterial suspension (X. axonopodis pv. phaseoli) prepared from a 24 hours old culture (OD540=0,4). Plants were kept in moister chambers for 24 hours before and after the inoculation. For protein extraction preparation, the three true leaves were collected individually at five different times: immediately before inoculation and 6, 24, 72 hours and 15 days after inoculation. The leaf extract was used for determination of total soluble proteins (TSP), and the activity of polyphenol oxidase (PPO) and peroxidase (PO) by spectrophometry. The results showed a significant increase in TSP content and PPO activity in plants treated with the isolated DFs842, when TSP content was the double of the non-treated plants. It was also observed that, even before pathogen inoculation, TSP content and PPO activity in plants treated was high. PO activity was reduced in Pseudomonas (DFs842)treated plants. The results showed evidence that metabolic alterations in plants are triggered upon seeds microbiolization, mainly due to the increase in TSP content and PPO activity. This indicates enzyme participation in induce host resistance with seed microbiolization with Pseudomonas (DFs842).

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO: Morphological and physiological photon flux influence under in vitro culture of apple shoots
DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO-INGLES: Morphological and Physiological Characterization of in vitro cultivated apple shoots

DETALHAMENTO-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-PERIODICO-OU-REVISTA: Brazilian Archives of Biology and Technology

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: The aim of the present study was to evaluate the growth and development of apple rootstock shoots submitted to different photon flux densities (7, 14, 21 and 60 μmol m-2 s-1) and three culture media. The best photon flux for maximizing growth, number of shoots and leaves was 14 μmol m-2 s-1, which also resulted in the highest values of chloroplastic pigments. On the other hand, the highest photon flux (60 μmol m-2 s-1) decreased significantly these parameters. Medium with reduced sucrose concentration did not affect the analyzed parameters, enabling an efficient multiplication of the cultivar with only 1% of sucrose.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO: PLANT GROWTH AND LEAF PHOTOSYNTHESIS IN RADISH PLANTS UNDER NaCl STRESS
DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO-INGLES: PLANT GROWTH AND LEAF PHOTOSYNTHESIS IN RADISH PLANTS UNDER NaCl STRESS

AUTORES.NOME-PARA-CITACAO: BACARIN, M. A.;Bacarin, M. A.;Bacarin, Marcos Antonio;Bacarin, M.A;Bacarin, Marcos A.;Bacarin, M.A.;ANTONIO BACARIN, MARCOS

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: The effects of salt stress (0-200 mM NaCl) on growth, photosynthetic pigment composition and photosynthesis were investigated in the radish (Raphanus sativus L. cv. Cometo) plants watered with half-strength Hoagland nutrient solution. The presence of 50 mM NaCl resulted in a leaf area, shoot dry weight and total chlorophyll and carotenoids contents reduction. However, the root dry matter decreased only above 100 mM NaCl. Salt stress induced no effect on the maximal efficiency of PSII photochemistry (F0, Fm, Fv/Fm and Fv/F0). However, the photochemical quenching (qP) decreased significantly with the increase in salt concentration higher that 50 mM NaCl, with no variation in non-photochemical quenching (qN). The net photosynthetic rate (A) measuring in fully expanded young leaves decreased significantly with the increase in salt concentration above 100 mM NaCl. Our results show that high salinity affected the radish growth as result of the total leaf area and dry weight reduction was parallel to decreased chlorophyll content. Although has not occurred changes in the chlorophyll fluorescence parameters, high salt concentrations could have contributed to reduced leaf photosynthetic rate.

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: The growth, assimilate partitioning and grain yield in BRS Pelota (higher yield) and BRS Firmeza (lower yield) rice cultivars were evaluated. The experiment was conducted in greenhouse (Department of Botany, Federal University of Pelotas) with entirely randomized design composed by two cultivars, nine plant sampling time and four replicates. BRS Pelota rice cultivar presented higher total dry matter accumulated (Wt), mainly to end of life cicle, as well a higher leaf area (Af). The dry matter allocated toward culm + sheath and panicles was higher in BRS Pelota. However, the Wt percentage accumulated in panicles at 125 DAE was equal between cultivars. In BRS Firmeza, the increase in Wt in the roots should had been influenced the photoassimilates partitioning toward grains and contributed to the lacking in plant senescence. The grain yield of BRS Pelota was higher than BRS Firmeza (17.4 versus 11.8 g vaso), and their panicle number was three times greater in relation to BRS Firmeza. The yield component which presented higher relevance for productivity was the panicle number. The higher grain yield of BRS Pelota could be related to higher leaf area and their leaf area duration, which permits the providing of elevated quantity of photoassimilates by higher period time.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO: Alteraзхes fotossintйticas e de crescimento em plantas de mamoeiro em resposta a diferentes regimes hнdricos
DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO-INGLES: Photosynthesis and growth changes in papaya plants under different water supply conditions

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: The aim of this work was to evaluate the effect of different water supply systems on the photochemical efficiency of photosystem II (PS II), amount of chlorophyll a, b and carotenoid pigments, stem height and diameter and dry weight of papaya cv. Sunrise Solo plants. Papaya plants were grown into 8 L pots filled with vegetal substrate in the greenhouse. At the third-leaf stage, plants were treated during 30 days withholding the water to reach 25%, 50% and 75% of field capacity (fc). The comparative analyses of the means were accomplished through the Analysis of Variance for a complete randomized design using the test of Tukey with 95% of significance. Only the plants exposed to 25% of field capacity presented a significant inhibition of PS II, as shown by Fv/Fm decrease, leaf pigment modification and inhibition of all growth parameters evaluated. Therefore, it is recommended the use of at least 50% of field capacity to avoid damages on photosynthesis and initial development of papaya plants.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO: Physiological analysis of leaf senescence of two rice cultivars with different yield potential
DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO-INGLES: Physiological analysis of leaf senescence of two rice cultivars with different yield potential

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: The objective of this work was to examine the photosynthetic pigment content, Chl a fluorescence, electron transport and oxygen evolution rates, during the early and late grain filling stages, in two rice genotypes (indica cultivar BRS Pelota and tropical japonica cultivar BRS Firmeza), with differences in grain yield. The plants were cultivated in a greenhouse and where the plants were in grain-filling stage the content of pigments, chlorophyll fluorescence and the photosynthetic oxygen evolution rate were determined on four leaves from the flag leaf. The content of pigments, FV/FM, the transport of electrons in the PS2 (ETR) and the rate of release of oxygen (OER) decreased with the position of leaves mainly in ?BRS Pelota?. The decrease in pigment content and photochemical efficiency of photosystem II (PS2) was lower in ?BRS Firmeza?. The FV'/FM' values decreased in ?BRS Pelota?, depending on the leaf position during the later grain filling stage. In 'BRS Firmeza', FV'/FM' increased slightly from the top to the bottom of the canopy, decreasing significantly decreased in the later grain filling stage.

The objective of this study was to evaluate a possible change incarbohydrates levels of tubers. From different genotypes of potatoes before and after storage at 4 oCand 20 oC. The tubers were produced at EMBRAPA Clima Temperado, Pelotas (RS). DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO: Chlorophyll fluorescence in rice: probing of senescence driven changes of PSII activity on rice varieties differing in grain yield capacity
DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO-INGLES: Chlorophyll fluorescence in rice: probing of senescence driven changes of PSII activity on rice varieties differing in grain yield capacity

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: With Japonica rice BRS Firmeza and indica rice BRS Pelota (low and high grain yield, respectively) as materials, Chl content and Chl a fluorescence parameters in flag leaves from the heading to mature grain stage were investigated. The Chl content and the Chl a fluorescence were measured using a portable chlorophyll meter CL-01 and portables fluorometer Handy-PEA and FMS-2 (Hansatech, Kings Lynn, UK), respectively. All measurements were taken on middle part of the flag leaves (n = 10). The results showed that the Chl content and Chl a fluorescence parameters declined after full expansion of flag leaves in both rice cultivars. However, these biochemical and photochemical parameters did not show similar changing pattern and the behavior of flag leaves senescence showed some differences between BRS Pelota and BRS Firmeza rice cultivars. During the senescence of flag leaves, BRS Pelota, the rice cultivar with higher grain yield capacity, was characterized by significant reductions in Chl content, PIABS,Total, TR0/ABS, ET0/ABS, ET0/TR0, RC/ABS compared to BRS Firmeza. On the other hand, DI0/RC, TR0/RC and ET0/RC were significantly higher in BRS Pelota. These results show that the decreased photosystem II activity, evaluated through chlorophyll fluorescence analysis, was resultant of leaves senescence process, which was much more expressive in BRS Pelota rice variety. We suggest that the higher productivity of BRS Pelota rice cultivar results from its higher assimilate mobilization ability or energy usage efficiency, in despite of its lower light absorption capacity.

Chlorophyll a fluorescence of sweet potato plants cultivated in vitro and during ex vitro acclimatization
DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO-INGLES: Chlorophyll a fluorescence of sweet potato plants cultivated in vitro and during ex vitro acclimatization

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: Sweet potato (Ipomoea batatas L.) plants were cultivated in vitro in Murashige and Skoog (MS) medium with 20 and 40 g L-1 of sucrose under two different photon flux densities (21 and 60 μmol m-2 s-1). Leaves developed in vitro mostly showed high variable to maximum fluorescence ratio (FV/FM), indicating good development of photosynthetic apparatus. This ratio decreased during leaf aging, especially in the plants cultivated in vitro on medium with higher sucrose concentration and higher photon flux. Leaves developed ex vitro showed high FV/FM ratio during whole experiment. The effective photochemical efficiency (FV?/FM?) was maximum at 15th day after emergence of leaves. Photosynthetic potential rate was higher in leaves developed in vitro than in leaves originated ex vitro.
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: Sweet potato (Ipomoea batatas L.) plants were cultivated in vitro in Murashige and Skoog (MS) medium with 20 and 40 g L-1 of sucrose under two different photon flux densities (21 and 60 μmol m-2 s-1). DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO: Produзгo de betacianina em erva-de-jacarй cultivada in vitro com diferentes concentraзхes de sulfato de cobre
DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO-INGLES: Betacyanin production in alligator weed, grown in vitro, with different concentrations of copper sulfate

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: A manipulaзгo da concentraзгo dos microelementos no meio de cultura representa uma boa estratйgia para aumentar a produзгo de metabуlitos secundбrios em cultura de tecidos. Este trabalho teve por objetivo demonstrar a influкncia do sulfato de cobre na produзгo de betacianina e na multiplicaзгo de plantas de Alternanthera philoxeroides (erva-de-jacarй) cultivadas in vitro. Segmentos nodais, obtidos de plantas prй-estabelecidas e apуs trкs subcultivos, foram inoculados em meio MS, com diferentes concentraзхes de CuSO4 (0; 25; 75; 125; 175; 200µM). O delineamento experimental utilizado foi inteiramente casualizado, com seis concentraзхes de CuSO4 e cinco repetiзхes representadas por um frasco contendo quatro explantes. Os resultados foram submetidos а anбlise de variвncia, а regressгo polinomial e a anбlises de correlaзгo entre as variбveis morfolуgicas e a produзгo de betacianina. Concentraзхes acima de 75µM diminuнram a altura das plantas, o nъmero de brotos e gemas e o crescimento radicular, enquanto que, na concentraзгo de 125µM, houve a maior produзгo de massa fresca. A produзгo de betacianina aumentou 60% em relaзгo ao controle com 175µM de CuSO4. Ocorreu crescimento das plantas em todas as concentraзхes de CuSO4 testadas, com exceзгo de 200µM, sendo esta considerada tуxica.
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: The manipulation of concentration of trace elements in the culture medium represents a good strategy to increase the production of secondary metabolites in tissue culture. This study aimed to demonstrate the influence of copper sulphate in the production of betacyanin and the multiplication of plants of Alternanthera philoxeroides (alligator weed) cultured in vitro. Nodal segments, obtained from plants pre-stablished and after three subcultures, were inoculated in basic MS with different concentrations of CuSO4 (0, 25, 75, 125, 175, 200µM). The results were subjected to analysis of variance, polynomial regression and correlation analysis between the morphological variables and the production of betacyanin. The experimental design was completely randomized with six concentration of CuSO4 and five replicates represented by a bottle containing four explants. Concentrations above 75µM decreased the height of the plant, number of shoots and buds and root growth, while the concentration of 125µM resulted in the highest fresh mass production. Betacyanin production increased 60% over control with 175µM CuSO4. Plant growth occurred in all tested concentrations of CuSO4, with the exception of 200µM which was toxic.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO: Photosynthetic activity in the rootstock of hybrid peach trees submitted to water restriction and flooding
DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO-INGLES: Photosynthetic activity in the rootstock of hybrid peach trees submitted to water restriction and flooding

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: This study aimed to evaluate the effect of flooding and water restriction (drought) on the photosynthetic activity in plants of the hybrid rootstock 'GxN-9' (Prunus dulcis Mill. Ч Prunus persica L. Bastsch), grown in a greenhouse. Chlorophyll fluorescence and gas exchange were analyzed in plants of approximately 12 months. The reduction of photosynthetic activity in both the stresses were associated with decreased carboxylation efficiency, but without affecting the internal concentration of carbon dioxide. The JIP-test parameters revealed changes in the energy flux processes demonstrating that in terms of flooding the rootstock GxN-9 the rate of photosynthetic performance significantly decreases, resulting in a considerable decrease in net assimilation rate. The JIP-test analysis was efficient in determining the thresholds mainly of the flood response, proving to be useful in exploration of the photosynthetic activity as a physiological marker of the stress tolerance.
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: This study aimed to evaluate the effect of flooding and water restriction (drought) on the photosynthetic activity in plants of the hybrid rootstock 'GxN-9' (Prunus dulcis Mill. DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO: Atividade antioxidante e viabilidade de sementes de girassol apуs estresse hнdrico e salino
DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO-INGLES: Antioxidant activity and the viability of sunflower seeds after saline and water stress

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: A presente pesquisa teve por objetivo avaliar o efeito de agentes indutores de estresse hнdrico e salino na germinaзгo, crescimento e resposta antioxidante de plвntulas de girassol. Sementes da cv. M735 foram germinadas em papel umedecido com soluзхes osmуticas nos potenciais de 0,0; -0,2; -0,4 e -0,8 MPa, induzidos com PEG 6000 e NaCl. O teste de germinaзгo foi conduzido com quatro subamostras de 100 sementes e quatro repetiзхes por tratamento, em cвmara de germinaзгo sob temperatura mйdia de 25 єC, na ausкncia de luz. Foram avaliados a porcentagem final e нndice de velocidade de germinaзгo das sementes, alйm do crescimento inicial e atividade de enzimas antioxidantes das plвntulas. O estresse hнdrico induzido por PEG 6000 aumentou a porcentagem de sementes germinadas no potencial de -0,2 MPa, por outro lado, para o NaCl no potencial de -0,8 MPa, houve significativa reduзгo. Para este mesmo potencial, tambйm houve reduзгo no нndice de velocidade de germinaзгo das sementes para ambos os agentes condicionantes. Para os parвmetros de crescimento, o comprimento da parte aйrea reduziu linearmente com o aumento das concentraзхes de PEG 6000 e NaCl. Jб para a massa seca de folhas e raнzes e o comprimento das raнzes, este efeito foi mais expressivo somente no potencial de -0,8 MPa. As enzimas SOD, APX e CAT apresentaram tendкncia de menor atividade nas plвntulas oriundas de sementes acondicionadas em PEG 6000. Na presenзa do NaCl, a atividade da SOD nas folhas aumentou significativamente nos trкs potenciais testados em relaзгo a testemunha. Para a APX e CAT este aumento foi observado nos potenciais de -0,2 e -0,4 MPa. Nas raнzes nгo foi observada diferenзa significativa. A anбlise conjunta dos parвmetros avaliados indica que a cv de girassol M735, nas condiзхes testadas, apresenta tolerвncia ao estresse hнdrico e salino atй o potencial de -0,4 MPa.
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: This study aimed to evaluate the effect of agents inducing water and saline stress on the seed germination and early growth and antioxidant activity in sunflower seedlings. Sunflower seeds, cv. M735, were germinated on moistened paper in solutions with osmotic potentials of 0.0, -0.2, -0.4 and -0.8 MPa induced by PEG 6000 and NaCl. The germination test was conducted with four samples of 100 seeds and four replicates per treatment, in a germination chamber at 25 єC without light. We evaluated the final percentage and speed of germination index, and the initial growth and activity of antioxidant enzymes in sunflower seedlings. Water stress induced by PEG 6000 increased the percentage of seeds germinated in the potential of -0.2 MPa, on the other hand, for NaCl in the potential of -0.8 MPa, there was a significant reduction. For this same potential, there was also a reduction in the rate of seed germination speed index in both conditioning agents. For the parameters of growth, shoot length decreased linearly with increasing concentrations of PEG 6000 and NaCl. As for the dry mass of leaves and roots and root length, this effect was more significant only in the potential of -0.8 MPa. The enzymes SOD, APX and CAT activity tended to be lower in seedlings originating from seeds in PEG 6000. In the presence of NaCl, the activity of SOD in the leaves increased significantly in the three tested for potential witnesses. For APX and CAT increase was observed at potentials of -0.2 and -0.4 MPa. In the roots there was no significant difference. An analysis of the evaluated parameters indicates that sunflower cv M735, under the conditions tested, showed tolerance to drought stress and salt until the potential of -0.4 MPa.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO: Chlorophyll a fluorescence as indicative of the salt stress on Brassica napus L.
DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO-INGLES: Chlorophyll a fluorescence as indicative of the salt stress on Brassica napus L.

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES:
The effects of salinity stress on chlorophyll fluorescence and the growth of

Brassica napus L were investigated. The chlorophyll a fluorescence transient were

recorded and analyzed according to the JIP-test which can quantify PSII performance.

Salt stress resulted in decreased leaf area and dry matter compared with the control

treatment (0 mM NaCl). The most pronounced effects of salt stress were observed

with 200 mM NaCl, and the hybrids displayed different levels of sensitivity to stress.

The Performance Index (PIABS) was the most sensitive parameter to salt stress, which

suggests that this parameter can be used to screen genotypes for salt tolerance.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO-INGLES: Crescimento e fotossнntese de plantas de pinhгo-manso cultivadas em diferentes condiзхes de luminosidade

DETALHAMENTO-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-PERIODICO-OU-REVISTA: Revista Brasileira de Engenharia Agrнcola e Ambiental (Online)

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: O pinhгo-manso (Jatropha curcas L.) tem-se destacado, no cenбrio do biodiesel, em funзгo da porcentagem de уleo contido nas sementes e de sua capacidade adaptativa. No Paнs, a cultura do pinhгo-manso tem, como proposta, o desenvolvimento agronфmico, razгo pela qual o uso consorciado pode ser importante aos pequenos produtores. Este trabalho teve como objetivo avaliar algumas caracterнsticas fenolуgicas de pinhгo-manso cultivado em dois regimes de luminosidade (pleno sol e sombrite 50%) relacionando com a sazonalidade climбtica e se utilizando de parвmetros da fluorescкncia da clorofila e de trocas gasosas. As plantas apresentaram crescimento vegetativo com padrгo sazonal, com pico de crescimento no inнcio de marзo, quando iniciou a senescкncia foliar. Alguns parвmetros da fluorescкncia transiente da clorofila analisados pelo Teste JIP, apresentaram relaзгo com as flutuaзхes ambientais. O PIABS e o PItotal demonstraram que as plantas do tratamento sombreado foram sensнveis а reduзгo de luminosidade. A taxa assimilatуria lнquida e a eficiкncia de carboxilaзгo reduziram ao longo do experimento acompanhando a queda da radiaзгo solar; jб as plantas de pinhгo-manso respondem negativamente a essas condiзхes de sombreamento.

Efeito de baixas temperaturas sobre a fluorescкncia da clorofila a em plantas de diferentes hнbridos de canola
Photosynthesis of soybean under the action of a photosystem II-inhibiting herbicide
DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO-INGLES: Photosynthesis of soybean under the action of a photosystem II-inhibiting herbicide

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: Photosynthesis, the fundamental physiological process of plant responsible for the growth and yield of crops, is strongly affected by environmental stresses. Several methods have been used to study changes in the physiological parameters of plants exposed to stresses. The work aimed to study physiological parameters related to photosynthesis in leaf discs of soybean plants exposed to a photosystem II-inhibiting herbicide. Soybean leaf discs obtained from mature leaves of plants in the vegetative stage immersed in bentazon herbicide solutions at concentrations of 0, 100, 250 or 500 μM were evaluated. In experiment I, the effect of the herbicide on chlorophyll a fluorescence transient was measured using a portable fluorometer. In the second experiment, the effect of the herbicide on modulated chlorophyll a fluorescence and gas exchange were evaluated, with the latter being measured with an infrared gas analyzer. The evaluations of transient and modulated fluorescence provided additional information on the photosynthetic activity of soybean leaf discs exposed to the action of bentazon. For the fluorescence transient analysis, performance indices were the parameters most sensitive to the action of bentazon, showing a decrease of approximately 70 % at a dose of 500 μM. For the modulated fluorescence analysis, the photochemical quenching coefficient, the electron transport rate, the photochemical efficiency of photosystem II and the net assimilation rate, decreased in response to herbicide application, with values that were almost equal to zero at a dose of 500 µM, which are the parameters that showed the greatest sensitivity to bentazon in soybean.

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: O trabalho teve como objetivo avaliar as caracterнsticas fotossintйticas, o crescimento e a produзгo de plantas de canola originadas de sementes microbiolizadas com bactйrias promotoras de crescimento. Foram desenvolvidos ensaios sequenciais utilizando diferentes isolados de bactйrias promotoras de crescimento em associaзгo com hнbridos de canola. No primeiro ensaio foram utilizados 96 isolados para a seleзгo massal de bactйrias promotoras de crescimento. Foram avaliados os parвmetros do Teste JIP obtidos a partir da fluorescкncia da clorofila, a бrea foliar e a massa seca da parte aйrea de plantas do hнbrido Hyola 433 aos 55 dias apуs a semeadura (DAS). O segundo ensaio foi desenvolvido em duas etapas com isolados selecionados no ensaio I: na etapa I avaliaram-se a fluorescкncia da clorofila, trocas gasosas e a massa seca da parte aйrea das plantas do hнbrido Hyola 433 por meio de trкs mediзхes em diferentes perнodos do ciclo da cultura; na etapa II procedeu-se a contagem das plвntulas emergidas e a avaliaзгo da fluorescкncia da clorofila, бrea foliar, massa seca das folhas e dos pecнolos e caules nas plantas do hнbrido Hyola 61 aos 41 DAS. No terceiro ensaio foram utilizados os isolados DFs 104, DFs 320, DFs 513 e DFs 628, selecionados nos experimentos anteriores; avaliou-se a emergкncia de plвntulas, os нndices de performance, a бrea foliar, a partiзгo de massa seca e os teores de clorofila durante o ciclo de crescimento das plantas. Ao final do experimento foram determinados os componentes de produзгo por planta e a composiзгo de бcidos graxos dos grгos. A correlaзгo entre os parвmetros do Teste JIP e as variбveis de crescimento permitiu a determinaзгo de parвmetros de interesse (F0/FM, FV/F0, ABS/RC, TR0/RC, φPo, PIabs e PItotal) para seleзгo de isolados com potencial para promoзгo de crescimento das plantas.
